name: Faerie Queene Online v3.01

screenshots.caption: Forrester Home in the updated FQO
The farm outside of Castle Joyeous

summary: Spenser's The Faerie Queene: module adventure for Neverwinter Nights 2
short_description:
This is a medieval fantasy role-playing adventure based on Book III of Spenser's The Faerie Queene using the Neverwinter Nights 2 game engine. The player wanders around a world fabricated after Faerie Land and encounters trials and quests befit for a knight. Created by a collaboration of three different semesters of the Worlds of Wordcraft class at Vanderbilt University, this visually-stunning module is sure to impress. 

If you've never read The Faerie Queene, you'll be sure to learn something about the plot, the themes, and the allegories. If you have read The Faerie Queene, you'll be delighted at the references and callbacks as this classical medieval adventure takes on a digital life in this world.

Requires Neverwinter Nights 2 - Download the .mod file and place it in the "modules" folder in the Neverwinter Nights 2 folder. You must open this from the game itself.

For more information, be sure to download The Faerie Queene Online Reference Guide as well!
